name: Dark Path
description:
Help Elif to return home before his greatest fears devour him  History 

Elif every one who is sleeping we place him in his nightmare that always remembers the place where he lost his mother thanks to a spider bite that killed her. When he lost his mother his grandfather   came to get it and take it with him.

Characters

Elif: He saw hen a gigant spider killed his mother, since then he dreamed with that day.

Spider: His biggest fear

Controls

W,A,S,D (Move the Character)

Mouse (Move the camara)
